item.title: Tennessee Teacher Who Mocked Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Got Her Job Back
item.description: Emily Orbison was reinstated on Nov. 11. She will receive back pay dating to Sept. 15, according to a district reinstatement letter.

item.title: A Ruthless Chinese Communist Party Requires A Ruthless Leader
item.description: A new biography of the father of Chinese leader Xi Jinping by Joseph Torigan, The Party’s Interests Come First , provides valuable insights into how t...

item.title: In Defense Of The Penny (Because Nobody Would Pay A Nickel For These Thoughts)
item.description: The penny’s detractors nickel and dime us to death with their arguments for efficiency over and against tradition.

item.title: Trump Is Right. Senate Republicans Should End The Filibuster Before It’s Too Late
item.description: The filibuster will end sooner or later, so conservatives should act now while they have power in the House, Senate, and White House.

item.title: If Trump Has The Power To Ban Trade, Then He Has The Power To Moderate It Through Tariffs
item.description: Legal precedent, diplomatic equilibrium, and economic logic point in this same direction — the president can impose tariffs under IEEPA.
